description: Currently working as an iOS Developer & Designer.Since 2007, I started to develop projects besides web programs such as developing iPhone apps and Objective-c.
I’m an experienced SCJP of Java and Web2.0, Which does limit to Search Engine Marketing, semantic markup, web standards, and JavaScript with AJAX.
Professional web designer and front-end freelance web developer with over 9 years experience - I design effective websites for your business and organisation.
Design, develop, code, test, build, deploy and debug new software. 5 + years Mobile Development in iOS and Android
I love all different forms of web development and design. I can help small businesses and artists improve their online efficiency.
